A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A disinterested little spicy boner of a film. It's clear Disney's priorities were in marketing and merchandising instead of actually telling a compelling story--forced\, tone-breaking humor; mary sue Rei amped up to 11; and Luke vigorously sucking alien tits for survival (seriously)\, take precedence of\, you know\, telling us where Snoke came from\, why Rei is so overpowered\, Leia flying like superman NOT being a laughably stupid idea...\nNot cool Disney. Mark Hamill tried to warn us\, and you silenced him.
